question_text: Which scenario best describes a site-to-site VPN?
answer_options: Two offices connect securely over the internet using firewalls as endpoints
A remote worker logs into the corporate network from home
A mobile device uses a hotspot for internet
correct_answer: Two offices connect securely over the internet using firewalls as endpoints
explanation: A site-to-site VPN connects entire networks (offices or branches) securely using VPN endpoints at each site.
